mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medicarecard (ybno, name, password, sex, age, profession, address, money) VALUES (#{ybno},#{name},#{password},#{sex},#{age},#{profession},#{address},#{money})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from medicarecard
where name like '%${_parameter}%' OR ybno like '%${_parameter}%' or sex like '%${_parameter}%'
